message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. It's a great deal for both of us. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I think $10,000 is a bit high. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for it. Can you meet me halfway?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still hoping for a bit more. I'm willing to come down to $9,500.  This is a fair price considering the value you'll get from this product.
I understand your position, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $9,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $9,250. Can you consider this?
